name: Client Name 1
text: Rohan delivered exceptional results on our location-based solution. His technical expertise and innovative approach exceeded our expectations. The project was completed ahead of schedule with outstanding quality.

name: Client Name 2
text: Working with Rohan was a game-changer for our product. His deep understanding of scalable architecture and AI/ML integration helped us build a robust platform that our users love.

text: Rohan's leadership and technical skills were instrumental in modernizing our legacy applications. His expertise in React and cloud technologies transformed our development process.
